about_the_game:
*Meet the new story and custom mode at the STUDIO*

“Meet your ONE and ONLY YUA”
Studio Customization mode is updated! Imagine your dream YUA wearing favorite hairstyles, Outfits and even with accessories.
The emotional, touching moment of first love becomes even more realistic with YUA in your own styling.

Also, capture this precious moments with Beauty Filter update for Camera.

“Studio dating with various poses and new storyline”
enables you to capture various poses and expressions of YUA at the PICNIC theme studio and Solid color horizon studio.
YUA's cheerful and bubbly reaction bursts out at the colorful themes!

♡ New Stories ♡


Finally, we became BAEs for each other.

A studio will be perfect spot to capture this precious moments.

This time, I am wondering a perfect.....wait! Who's calling YUA on her cellphone?
The one named "♡" ??!!?!??!?!!!! Who is this? Why is this person calling?

[Bonuses]
3 New costumes for YUA
Camera memory Card (+20)
** Camera memory will be expanded to maximum quantity (30)
detailed_description:
*Meet the new story and custom mode at the STUDIO*

“Meet your ONE and ONLY YUA”
Studio Customization mode is updated! Imagine your dream YUA wearing favorite hairstyles, Outfits and even with accessories.
The emotional, touching moment of first love becomes even more realistic with YUA in your own styling.

Also, capture this precious moments with Beauty Filter update for Camera.

“Studio dating with various poses and new storyline”
enables you to capture various poses and expressions of YUA at the PICNIC theme studio and Solid color horizon studio.
YUA's cheerful and bubbly reaction bursts out at the colorful themes!

♡ New Stories ♡


Finally, we became BAEs for each other.

A studio will be perfect spot to capture this precious moments.

This time, I am wondering a perfect.....wait! Who's calling YUA on her cellphone?
The one named "♡" ??!!?!??!?!!!! Who is this? Why is this person calling?

[Bonuses]

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports

short_description: Meet the new story and custom mode at STUDIO DLC of FOCUS on YOU ♡
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
